alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 3:31PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pennington County through 400 PM MDT... At 330 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palmer Gulch Resort, or over Hill City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Keystone Wye around 335 PM MDT. Sheridan Lake around 340 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hisega, Silver City and Pactola Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near Sheridan Lake, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
